summary: An Ordinance granting an extension of the lease of the pumping plant at Lake Washington, and the pipe line extending therefrom to the Beacon Hill Reservoir, and the Beacon Hill Reservoir, in the City of Seattle, belonging to the City of Seattle, to the Lewis Construction Company, and authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works of the City of Seattle to make and execute an extension of said lease, for the period of two years from July 10, 1908.
